welcome_message_body: Welcome to Danbury, where small-town charm meets big-city excitement! Known for its rich history, beautiful parks, and vibrant arts scene, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Royal Guard Fish & Chips
restaurants.description: Royal Guard Fish & Chips is a fish and chips shop located in Danbury.

restaurants.name: Hanna's Middle Eastern Restaurant and Market
restaurants.description: Hanna's Middle Eastern Restaurant and Market is a middle eastern restaurant located in Danbury.

restaurants.name: Mothership on Main
restaurants.description: Mothership on Main is a bakery located in Danbury.
restaurants.address: 331 Main St (at Crosby St), Danbury, CT 06810

restaurants.name: Edo II
restaurants.description: Edo II is a korean restaurant located in Danbury.

restaurants.name: Michael Angelo's
restaurants.description: Michael Angelo's is a pizzeria located in Danbury.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Danbury Municipal Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers including dining options, retail stores, and rental car services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Danbury Municipal Airport caters to private and chartered flights, offering a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Waterbury-Oxford Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Waterbury-Oxford Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Igor I. Sikorsky Memorial Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Igor I. Sikorsky Memorial Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of Westchester County Apt Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Terminal B serves international flights at Westchester County Apt Airport.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dutchess County Airport offers domestic flights to various destinations.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Dutchess County Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
